original: People are always saying that I have one of those familiar faces, so I figure there must be a few guys out there who look like me.  I've attached a recent photo below.  I really need to tighten my belt for a while - the roulette table has been pounding me in the ass the past couple of months!  If anybody thinks they could pass for me and would like to go halfsies on a few memberships, please get in touch!  Ideally, you should live in or near Leftwood in Alderney.  If you really are my doppelganger, you can also share my girlfriend.  She's high maintenance but gives head like her life depended on it.
translated: 别人总是说我大众脸，那长得和我很像的人一定有很多吧。我在下面附了张近照。最近真得勒紧裤腰带了，这几个月我被轮盘赌给压榨完了！有人觉得自己能顶替我，愿意合我平摊某些会员的费用，请务必联系我！住在Alderney的Leftwood附近的话最好。如果你真的是我的替身，和你共享女朋友也可以。她很难伺候，但是技术真的很好。
